name: Sarah Al-Asousi
intro: I’m Sarah Al-Asousi, an aspiring Software Engineer with an ardent passion for creativity. I thrive on the intersection of technology and art, finding joy in crafting innovative solutions and bringing ideas to life through code. Welcome to my portfolio
bio: I’m a proud graduate of UMass Amherst with a degree in Business Management and Entrepreneurship, complemented by a minor in Computer Science. My journey in software engineering took a decisive leap with a full-time 500+ hour intensive at General Assembly, where I immersed myself in crafting full-stack applications using JavaScript, React, Node, and MongoDB. Post-graduation, my commitment to software engineering has driven me to independently develop and expand my skills, creating diverse applications that reflect my passion for innovation. I believe in the power of coding as a canvas for expression, enabling me to push boundaries and explore new possibilities. My journey in the tech world is a testament to my dedication to continuous learning and growth. Beyond coding, my leadership roles, such as Director of Sponsorship and Task Lead for the annual Women of Isenberg Conference, have shaped my commitment to fostering diverse and inclusive environments. I'm excited about the prospect of contributing to dynamic teams, combining my skills in business and technology to drive impactful solutions. I’m ready to bring my passion and skills to your company! Let's create something extraordinary together.
